open.title: MetroFibre outage | Mountain Rise
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Mountain Rise, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: Evotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Lenasia, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Evotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: We have received confirmation that the problem is also affecting Lenasia South and Ennerdale.
